findings.message:
Governance.execute(uint256,address,bytes) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#124-139) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	- (success,returnData) = _target.delegatecall(_data) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#134)
findings.name: controlled-delegatecall

findings.message: Governance.lockVotes() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#91-97) ignores return value by votingToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),tokenBalance) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#93)
findings.name: unchecked-transfer

findings.message: Governance.withdraw() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#183-187) ignores return value by votingToken.transfer(msg.sender,balanceOf[msg.sender]) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#185)
findings.name: unchecked-transfer

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Governance.withdraw() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#183-187):
	External calls:
	- votingToken.transfer(msg.sender,balanceOf[msg.sender]) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#185)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _burn(msg.sender,balanceOf[msg.sender]) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#186)
		- balanceOf[_account] -= _amount (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#194)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Governance.execute(uint256,address,bytes) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#124-139):
	External calls:
	- (success,returnData) = _target.delegatecall(_data) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#134)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposal.executed = true (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#136)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
Governance.execute(uint256,address,bytes)._target (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#124) lacks a zero-check on :
		- (success,returnData) = _target.delegatecall(_data) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#134)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Governance.lockVotes() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#91-97):
	External calls:
	- votingToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),tokenBalance) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#93)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- _mint(msg.sender,tokenBalance) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#94)
		- balanceOf[_account] += _amount (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#190)
	- voteLock[msg.sender] = block.timestamp + votingPeriod (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#95)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Governance.vote(uint256,bool) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#163-181):
	External calls:
	- lockVotes() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#163)
		- votingToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),tokenBalance) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#93)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposal.forVotes += votes (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#173)
	- proposal.againstVotes += votes (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#175)
	- receipt.hasVoted = true (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#178)
	- receipt.support = _support (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#179)
	- receipt.votes = votes (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#180)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Governance.propose(address,bytes) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#141-161):
	External calls:
	- lockVotes() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#141)
		- votingToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),tokenBalance) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#93)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- proposalCount ++ (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#147)
	- proposals[newProposal.id] = newProposal (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#158)
findings.name: reentrancy-benign

findings.message:
Governance.withdraw() (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#183-187) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp > voteLock[msg.sender],Governance::withdraw: wait until voteLock expiration) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#184)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Governance.state(uint256) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#103-122) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= proposal.startTime + votingPeriod (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#107)
	- block.timestamp < proposal.startTime + executionPeriod (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#116)
findings.name: timestamp

findings.message:
Governance.state(uint256) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#103-122) compares to a boolean constant:
	-proposal.executed == true (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#110)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message:
Governance.vote(uint256,bool) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#163-181) compares to a boolean constant:
	-require(bool,string)(receipt.hasVoted == false,Governance::vote: voter already voted) (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#168)
findings.name: boolean-equal

findings.message: Pragma version^0.8.1 (../..0x3157439c84260541003001129c42fb6aba57e758.sol#3) allows old versions
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.8.19 is not recommended for deployment
findings.name: solc-version
